channel.title: Space on Bill's Tech Tips
channel.description: Recent content in Space on Bill's Tech Tips

item.title: Space Weather
item.description: https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/ Space Weather impacts numerous facets of everyday life, from where airplanes can safely fly, to how accurately a farmer plows his field. In addition, there are a large variety of phenomena that are driven by the variability of the sun over periods ranging from hours to years. SWPC provides information for novices and experts alike about the impacts and phenomena of Space Weather. Aviation https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/communities/aviation-community-dashboard Electric Power https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/communities/electric-power-community-dashboard Space Weather https://www.
